* Iron Raptor sighed as she heard Quake, wishing that she really could go to 
the Ark but knew that she couldn't leave the base at this time.
She crossed her arms and leaned against the wall nearest to her.*

" I wish I could, Quake. But I have to stay here. If you wanna look at the 
Ark I'm sure the ship logs have the info you'll need on it. All you would 
need to do is defend it if it fell under attack and protect the repair crew 
as they worked. Nothing more."

* She then looked up in time to see Silverbolt walk into the room, wondering 
just what he was there for.
But when she hears him speak she simply leanes back a bit.*

" Well, I wouldn't mind if you also helped defend the Ark when I send the 
repair team to it. But it won't be for a bit."
